basics.name: Galen Chang
basics.label: Computer Science Student
summary:
Prior 17C (Cyber Operations) in the U.S. Army

Currently studying Computer Science at the University of Hawaii at Manoa.

Expected graduation is in Spring, 2024.

education.institution: University of Hawaii at Manoa, Honolulu, HI
courses: Programming Courses using Java and Python

work.summary: Provide network defense for Hawaii Air National Guard systems and customers.
highlights: Identify and eliminate intrusions or compromises.
Give security recommendations to customers to prevent recurrence.
Write mid level summaries of events and steps taken to mitigate/eliminate threat.

work.summary: Trained to execute offensive cyber operations (OCO) and accomplished numerous computer network exploitation (CNE) objectives to satisfy national requirements in support of foreign intelligence efforts.
highlights: NSA and USCC certified senior exploitation operator and trainer.
Conducted quality assurance and assisted in development of CNE tools and techniques.
Wrote standard operating procedure and policy for tradecraft, exploitation, and tool usage/testing.
Performed basic malware analysis in order to ascertain functionality, footprint, and persistence methods.
Member, PANDA (Programming and Algorithms) at the University of Hawai'i at Manoa, 2022-Present
Member, Grey Hats at the University of Hawai'i at Manoa, 2022-Present
Club Representative, Anime Manga Society of Hawai'i at the University of Hawai'i at Manoa, 2022-Present

awards.title: Various U.S. Army Awards
awards.summary: Awards for both military performance and occupational specialty.
